ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed
1 bunch green onions, finely chopped (white parts only)

cookingTips: Cottage cheese creates a creamier, lighter quiche than heavy cream; mix it well for even distribution
Drain spinach well and squeeze dry to prevent excess liquid from making the quiche watery
Use the white parts of green onions only for a milder, fresher flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain how cottage cheese is a lighter alternative to cream, guide proper spinach and green onion prep, and manage baking time for set but moist results.
